articles.title: Unlock Your Smartphone's Potential: 3 AI Features You Can Use Daily
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Smartphones, especially Samsung Galaxy devices, are introducing new AI-powered features like Circle to Search for image recognition and information retrieval, the Provisual Engine for advanced photo and video editing, and Live Translate for real-time conversation translation. These features aim to revolutionize user experiences by simplifying tasks, enhancing creativity, and improving global communication directly from mobile devices.

articles.title: Chinese sex doll maker sees jump in 2025 sales as AI boosts adult toys' user experience
articles.author: Coco Feng
articles.summary: WMDoll expects a 30% sales increase this year due to integrating open-source generative AI models into its anthropomorphic sex toys. The company's MetaBox series now includes an AI module connected to cloud computing services, enabling more responsive and interactive experiences for users. The dolls use Meta's Llama AI models, allowing for fine-tuning and deployment in various markets.

articles.title: Chinese sex doll maker sees jump in 2025 sales as AI improves user experience
articles.author: Coco Feng
articles.summary: WMDoll is launching a new generation of sex dolls integrated with AI. These dolls use open-source large language models like Meta's Llama to enhance user interaction, making them more responsive. The latest MetaBox series incorporates an AI module connected to cloud computing, improving customer satisfaction through advanced expressive capabilities.

articles.title: LIST: Power outages in Tri-Cities
articles.author: Kenzie Hagood
articles.summary: Dyson's Gen5outsize Absolute vacuum cleaner features strong suction power, a sleek design, and cutting-edge technology.

articles.title: HONOR Philippines Embraces Filipino Resilience and Innovation
articles.summary: HONOR Philippines highlights its new products tailored for the Filipino market. These include the HONOR Magic6 Pro featuring the "World's No.1 Camera System of 2024", the HONOR Magic V3, the "World's Thinnest Foldable Smartphone", and the durable HONOR X9c 5G. The company emphasizes their commitment to innovation and resilience by launching new products.

articles.title: Captain America: Brave New World is a mess — but the '5D' version I saw was even messier
articles.author: Michael McWhertor
articles.summary: Tide sponsored a "5D" promotional screening of Captain America: Brave New World, branded as "Collateral Stains Screening", involving effects like mud and water sprays. Attendees were provided with Tide-branded face shields and promised Tide Pods after the messy event, promoting Tide's stain removal capabilities.

articles.title: What Leaders Can Learn About Innovation From A Pistol Maker
articles.author: Chip Bell
articles.summary: Samuel Colt revolutionized pistol production by implementing interchangeable parts and assembly line techniques. He was also a marketing genius, promoting his Colt pistols globally by gifting them to celebrities and foreign leaders, and advertising in popular magazines. Colt's marketing efforts were driven by his passion for promoting the Colt pistol and recognizing the importance of brand awareness.

articles.title: ByteDance shakes up AI industry with Goku AI launch
articles.author: Web Desk
articles.summary: ByteDance has launched Goku AI, a new open-source artificial intelligence model designed for generating images and videos. Goku AI, named after a famous anime character, utilizes rectified flow transformers to enhance the quality and realism of generated visuals. This launch is expected to increase competition in the AI industry and potentially transform content creation.

articles.title: 12 Ice Creams From Aldi, Ranked Worst To Best
articles.author: Julia Duda
articles.summary: Aldi offers a variety of ice cream flavors under its Sundae Shoppe brand.  The brookie dough ice cream, featuring brownie and chocolate chip cookie dough chunks in chocolate and vanilla ice cream, is rated as the best flavor, while the cookies and cream is also highly regarded for its generous cookie content. The strawberry ice cream is also rated highly for its natural flavor and creamy texture.

articles.title: Why I don't use a phone case in 2025
articles.author: Chris Hachey
articles.summary: Samsung is unveiling the Galaxy S25 lineup, detailing price and availability. Apple's iPhone 16 Pro line will feature upgrades over the iPhone 15 Pro, including a dedicated camera button, a new A18 Pro chip, a bigger screen, and several AI-powered Apple Intelligence features.

articles.title: How to create salon-style hair at home
articles.author: Stephanie Darling
articles.summary: The Bamboo Shop introduces Hair Turban, designed to absorb moisture. The Wet Brush Pro Deluxe Detangler introduces a detangling brush. Aveda showcases Brilliant Damage Control, a heat protectant. Davines promotes OI All in One Milk, a heat protector and treatment. Moroccanoil highlights the Ionic Ceramic Thermal Brush and Parlux the 3800 hairdryer. SachaJuan presents Finish Cream for sealing moisture and preventing frizz.

articles.title: 'I ditched my straighteners and Airwrap for the ghd Rise Hot Brush that's all over TikTok'
articles.author: Bethan Shufflebotham
articles.summary: Ghd has launched the Rise Hot Brush, a styling device with a 32mm barrel designed for creating volume and body. The brush heats up in 25 seconds and features a safety shut-off. The ghd Rise Hot Brush is out of stock on the ghd website, but it is still available on Amazon for £179.

articles.title: 4 things I'd change on the Google Pixel 9 Pro Fold to make it perfect
articles.author: Chris Wedel
articles.summary: Google launched the Pixel 9 Pro Fold, succeeding the Pixel Fold, with an $1,800 starting price. It features a larger 8-inch Super Actua inner display and a 6.3-inch outer display, powered by Google's Tensor G4 chipset and 16GB of RAM. The flagship foldable is now available in several new countries, including Canada, India and Australia.

articles.title: The Ninja Swirl by CREAMi is still in stock and it's a must-have for families. ...
articles.author: Lehigh Valley
articles.summary: Ninja introduced the Ninja Swirl by CREAMi, a new kitchen appliance.

articles.title: I thought my Kindle Fire was toast -- turns out, it just needed a career change
articles.author: Chris Hachey
articles.summary: Amazon is rolling out a new update for the Kindle Scribe e-reader. This update focuses on improvements to the Active Canvas feature of the device, enhancing its functionality.

articles.title: I thought my Kindle Fire was toast -- turns out, it just needed a career change
articles.author: Chris Hachey
articles.summary: Amazon has launched the Fire Max 11 tablet, an affordable device with access to popular services and functions, featuring a better build and optional keyboard and stylus. Amazon is rolling a new update for the Kindle Scribe to improve its Active Canvas feature. The company also continues to support older Fire tablets with updates and various functionalities.

articles.title: These 3 Easy Steps Helped Us Reuse an Old Phone as a Security Camera
articles.author: Tyler Lacoma
articles.summary: The article introduces methods to repurpose old smartphones into home security cameras using apps like Alfred, Faceter, Epoccam and iVCam. These apps offer features like remote viewing, motion detection, and cloud storage, providing a cost-effective way to enhance home security. Users can download these apps on both old and new phones, configuring the old phone as a camera and the new phone as a viewer.

articles.title: YouTube Shorts Integrates Veo 2 AI Model, Enabling Standalone AI Video Creation, Here's How To Use It
articles.author: ABP News Bureau
articles.summary: YouTube has launched an enhanced Dream Screen feature powered by Google's Veo 2 AI model, enabling users to generate complete AI-generated videos from text prompts for YouTube Shorts. Veo 2 improves video detail, realism, and cinematic quality.

articles.title: Get a HUGE $180 discount on the 'lightweight and powerful' Dyson cordless stick and handheld vacuum combo: 'It has changed my life!'
articles.author: TANYA SHARMA
articles.summary: The Dyson V8 Extra Cordless Vacuum is on sale for $299.98, reduced from $469. The vacuum is a cordless model with eight attachments and whole-machine filtration, suitable for cleaning various surfaces and capturing harmful particles. QVC offers an additional $10 discount for first-time purchasers with code WELCOME10.

articles.title: BuzzFeed's TikTok-Famous Kitchen Finds You NEED in Your Life
articles.author: Buzz Feed
articles.summary: TikTok is popularizing kitchen gadgets like veggie choppers with multiple blades, toasters with see-through windows and special settings, spatulas with versatile designs, chip clips for airtight snack storage, an avocado slicer, and an ice cream maker that relies on frozen fruit. These gadgets aim to improve cooking convenience and efficiency.

articles.title: 5 reasons budget phones actually rule now
articles.author: Roger Fingas
articles.summary: The article discusses several smartphones. Nothing Phone 2a is stylish with glyph lighting. The camera bar on the back of the Pixel 8a makes it feel premium.  Motorola Razr foldables are entering the budget arena, and Samsung is rumored to be working on a cheaper Z Flip device.

articles.title: New Grand Rapids seafood counter making waves with po'boys, oysters Rockefeller
articles.author: Isaac Ritchey
articles.summary: Fishmonger's Seafood Market, owned by Louis and Zully Hemper, opened in Grand Rapids in December. The market offers ethically sourced fresh seafood and home-crafted recipes including fish tacos, Louisiana po' boy, coconut shrimp and oyster Rockefeller. Online ordering is available through the restaurant's website.

articles.title: 65 Weird-As-Hell Things For Women On Amazon That Are Actually Life-Changing
articles.summary: The article introduces a variety of products designed to enhance daily life.  These include the Lively Breeze Hedgehog Ceramic Diffuser which offers aroma diffusion, the Genuine Fred Silicone Tea Infuser Frog which offers a eco-friendly way to brew tea, and the Conair Heated Lotion Dispenser which enhances the skincare routine. The FRESHPAPER Produce Freshness Sheets naturally extend the life of fruits and veggies.

articles.title: Prime Minister Modi to Inaugurate Mega Bharat Tex 2025 Global Textile Event
articles.author: Devdiscourse News Desk
articles.summary: Prime Minister Narendra Modi will inaugurate Bharat Tex 2025, a global textile sector exhibition. The event aims to unite the complete textile supply chain, showcasing raw materials to finished products and hosting expert sessions. Bharat Tex 2025 will feature innovation-focused events and attract global figures, including exhibitors and international buyers.

articles.title: I'm a beauty writer - I swear this AI tool to get the cheapest skincare is perfect for me
articles.author: Nisha Mal
articles.summary: Noli has launched a free AI-powered service that analyzes skin and provides personalized skincare routines.  The service, accessible via the Noli website, uses a quiz and facial scan to determine skin type and concerns, then suggests products with potential discounts.  Users can prioritize their skincare worries and receive tailored routines with alternative product suggestions.

articles.title: Next £32 linen dress that 'fits beautifully' is 'perfect for holidays'
articles.author: Emily Chaplin
articles.summary: Next has introduced new patterns for its Linen Scoop Back Mini Shift Dress, available in four patterns and colours. Consumers describe the dress as comfortable, versatile, and suitable for both casual and dressy occasions. The dress is designed for everyday wear and can be styled with sliders or wedges.

articles.title: Plans for Midtown grocery store stoke Aldi speculation. Here's what the chain had to say.
articles.author: Erin Udell
articles.summary: Aldi is considering expanding its footprint to Fort Collins with a potential new store. This is part of Aldi's plan to add 800 stores nationwide by the end of 2028, including opening more than 225 stores in 2025. The conceptual plan for an 18,000-square-foot grocery store has been filed, although Aldi has not yet confirmed the Fort Collins location.

articles.title: 55 Cheap, Genius Things That'll Save You From Expensive Home Upgrades & Repairs
articles.author: Alexandra Elizabeth
articles.summary: The article highlights several newly available home improvement products designed for easy DIY installation and cost-effectiveness. These include items such as water leak detectors that send alerts to a corresponding app, peel-and-stick molding for custom wainscoting, and various repair kits for grout, furniture, and screens, offering consumers affordable solutions for home maintenance and upgrades. The products provide consumers affordable and easy solutions for home improvements.

articles.title: Top 5 Unlocking Websites
articles.author: Busines Newswire
articles.summary: UnlockGSM offers AT&T and T-Mobile unlocking services with fast cell phone unlocks. DoctorSIM provides IMEI checks for various brands like Samsung and Verizon. UnlockRiver supports unlocking phones on over 700 carriers across 120 countries, while MobileUnlocked offers IMEI lookups and unlocking services for any carrier-locked phone.

articles.title: Sustainable Swaps: Eco-Friendly Products That Make a Difference
articles.author: Buzz Feed
articles.summary: Terra Ties offers biodegradable hair ties as an alternative to standard hair ties. Several companies provide reusable lint rollers and Swiffer dusters to reduce waste from disposable options. A washable face roller is introduced as a reusable alternative to blotting papers, while an eco-minded small business founded by two Adams created a durable razor with recyclable blades and plastic-free packaging.

articles.title: Apple's Next iPhone SE Is Around the Corner
articles.author: Wired
articles.summary: OnePlus is releasing the Watch 3, which is marketed with big battery claims. Ninja is launching the Swirl, an ice cream and soft-serve maker. Google has announced the date for its I/O event.

articles.title: The Engineering Marvel of Huawei Mate XT
articles.author: Busines Newswire
articles.summary: Huawei has launched the Mate XT smartphone, featuring a revolutionary display with LTPO adaptive refresh, a tri-camera system with a 50MP ultra-vision sensor, and is powered by HarmonyOS 4.0. The phone comes with satellite communication capabilities and emergency features, aiming to redefine the smartphone experience.

articles.title: Kylie Jenner has launched a new powder foundation – here's how it looks on dry skin
articles.author: Faith Richardson
articles.summary: Kylie Cosmetics launched the Natural Blur Powder Foundation, retailing for £29. The foundation promises up to 12 hours of wear with a lightweight, matte finish. The reviewer also mentions Kylie Cosmetics Skin Tint Blurring Elixir Foundation as a preferable alternative and compares it to other powder foundations like Nars and Fenty Beauty.

articles.title: Could a cup of coffee on toast replace your morning latte? We try ‘revolutionary' Swiss coffee taste from a tube – with very surprising results…
articles.author: Elijah
articles.summary: No normal coffee, a Swiss company, launched a new coffee product: a coffee paste. This paste is made from 100% fairtrade arabica beans and organic beet sugar, designed for spreading on food. The product offers a convenient, portable option for coffee consumption and provides a rich flavor with chocolate, nut, and caramel notes.

articles.title: EXCLUSIVE Could a cup of coffee on toast replace your morning latte? We try 'revolutionary' Swiss coffee taste from a tube - with very surprising results...
articles.author: ELMIRA TANATAROVA
articles.summary: A Swiss company has launched 'No Normal Coffee,' a caffeinated paste crafted from Fairtrade Arabica beans, designed to be eaten or drunk. This product is marketed as a portable and convenient option for activities like camping, offering a unique alternative to traditional coffee consumption.

articles.title: ⚡Know All About New Honda NX200 Bike Launched in India
articles.summary: Honda launched the NX200 in India, a rebranded version of the CB200X. The NX200 features upgraded technology.

articles.title: China's Goku AI Challenges OpenAI, Reshaping the Future of Video AI
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: ByteDance has introduced Goku AI, an open-source generative AI model, that specializes in creating high-quality images and videos. This challenges OpenAI's dominance and democratizes AI access, potentially streamlining content creation and enhancing efficiency across various industries. The model's open-source nature allows wider accessibility but also raises ethical concerns regarding potential misuse.

articles.title: ByteDance launches Goku AI, taking on OpenAI in the AI race
articles.author: News Desk
articles.summary: ByteDance has launched Goku AI, a new open-source artificial intelligence model for image and video generation. Goku AI leverages rectified flow transformers, which enhances the flow of information during generation, resulting in smoother, more accurate visuals and competes with models like OpenAI's Sora.

articles.title: ஜியோ ஹாட்ஸ்டார் அறிமுகம்.. என்னென்ன சேவைகள் கிடைக்கும்.?: அசத்தலான அறிவிப்பு!
articles.summary: Jio is launching a Hotstar subscription service. Details regarding content and the subscription price are available.

articles.title: Samsung rolls out global campaign for Galaxy S25, featuring Galaxy AI
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics, in collaboration with BBH Singapore, has launched the global campaign for the Galaxy S25 Series, positioning Galaxy AI as an essential companion. The campaign showcases the Galaxy S25 Ultra's AI features that seamlessly integrate into users' routines, highlighting the device's ability to transform everyday experiences across multiple channels.

articles.title: The Shower Capsule: The Future of Bathroom Design in 2025
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: The shower capsule is being introduced as a groundbreaking innovation in bathroom design for 2025. It is a compact, prefabricated unit with sleek lines and modern materials, offering features like built-in LED lighting, personalized temperature settings, aromatherapy, and water-saving technology. The shower capsule aims to revolutionize bathroom design by providing a luxurious, eco-friendly, and adaptable showering experience.

articles.title: If You Despise Cleaning, These 25 Target Products Will Make You Loathe It A Little Less
articles.author: Brock Pirtle
articles.summary: The article showcases a range of cleaning products, including the Bissel carpet cleaner, Levoit air purifier, Dyson cordless stick vacuum, and Swiffer Wet Jet.  These products, available at Target, aim to simplify cleaning tasks with features like portability, powerful filtration, and disposable components. The Pink Stuff cleaning paste is also highlighted for its effectiveness and wide range of applications.

articles.title: Bosch pressure washer that 'obliterates dirt' has 22% off at Amazon
articles.author: Lauren Codling
articles.summary: Amazon has reduced the price of the Bosch EasyAquatak 110 High-Pressure Washer to £66.06. Argos is offering the Black + Decker Vertical Pressure Washer at its lowest price ever, £57. Kärcher's K 4 Power Control Car & Home model is now reduced to £269.99.

articles.title: Pick Sky over Samsung for S25 phone and get Galaxy Watch and Buds 3Pro for £0
articles.author: Harriet Morphy-Morris
articles.summary: Samsung launched its newest S25 series smartphones, and retailers are offering deals and giveaways. Sky Mobile provides a free Galaxy Watch7 and Galaxy Buds3 Pro with S25 contracts until February 26, while Mobiles.co.uk includes a fast charger and clear case in their S25 orders until February 27. Amazon is offering a £100 discount on outright purchases of the S25 series.

articles.title: Roundball Roundup: Hilton, Eastridge score upset wins
articles.author: AJ Feldman
articles.summary: Dyson's Gen5outsize Absolute vacuum boasts strong suction power, a sleek design, and cutting-edge technology. The company positions this product as a worthwhile investment.

articles.title: Pick Sky over Samsung for S25 and get Galaxy Watch and Buds 3Pro for £0
articles.author: Harriet Morphy-Morris
articles.summary: Samsung launched the S25 series, and retailers like Sky Mobile and Mobiles.co.uk are offering promotional deals. Sky Mobile gifts a free Galaxy Watch7 and Galaxy Buds3 Pro with S25 contracts until February 26. Mobiles.co.uk provides a similar bundle, including a fast charger and case, on contracts from Vodafone and iD Mobile.

articles.title: If You're Ready To Give Your Beauty Routine A Glow-Up In 2025, You'll Definitely Want To Try These 30 Products
articles.author: Samantha Wieder
articles.summary: The article highlights several new and noteworthy beauty products available on Amazon, ranging from skincare to haircare and makeup. These include the L'Oreal Paris rinse-out lamellar water treatment, dark spot remover soap bars, a L'Oreal glow-enhancing lotion, exfoliating pads, a winged eyeliner stamp, and a smudge-proof creamy eyeliner.  The article also features other products like Lilac St. false lashes, E.l.f. cosmetics, a Nars creamy concealer, Urban Decay setting spray, a detangling brush, a cleansing oil, and a Shark FlexStyle, with reviewer testimonials emphasizing their effectiveness and ease of use.

articles.title: Nexus 7 Pixel edition: it's time for Google to resurrect the greatest tablet ever
articles.author: Pocket Lint
articles.summary: In 2012, Google partnered with Asus to launch the Nexus 7, a mini Android tablet.

articles.title: $25 Kmart item gymgoers ‘obsessed' with flying off shelves
articles.author: Eleanor Katelaris
articles.summary: Kmart has launched a $25 portable blender, part of their February Living Launch, designed for making smoothies and drinks on the go. The 400mL blender features stainless steel blades, a USB charging cable, and is available in four colors. Customer reviews are positive, with many praising its convenience and portability.

articles.title: Now dispensing: New vending machines in Singapore bank on fresh brews, bakes and meals
articles.author: Eunice Quek
articles.summary: Several companies in Singapore are introducing new vending machine concepts. Kopi Near Me offers freshly brewed local coffee, while InstaChef provides halal-certified hot meals via AI-automated kitchens. Butter Town has launched a shio pan 'ATM' dispensing freshly baked Japanese salted butter rolls, and What The Cup provides over 300 customizable drink options.

articles.title: Where can we download Jam WiFi app (sans malware)? February 14, 2025 6:49 PM Subscribe
articles.summary: Jam discontinued support for their Wi-Fi products, leading to the removal of their app from app stores. Consequently, the app is no longer available for download, potentially rendering Jam Wi-Fi speakers unusable.

articles.title: We Haven't Even Fully Dropped the Xbox One, and Microsoft Has Reportedly Approved It's Next-Generation Console
articles.summary: Microsoft's next-generation Xbox console hardware has been fully approved and costed. It is in development and has moved past early pitch stages.

articles.title: 'Ziddi Girls': Prime Video Introduces Us To The 'Stubborn, Fearless, & Fabulous Girls Of Matilda House'
articles.author: MENA FN
articles.summary: Prime Video launched "Ziddi Girls", a new original young adult series. Pritish Nandy Communications produced the series.

articles.title: NewJeans Funko Pop Collection: Where to Buy K-Pop Figurines Online
articles.author: Billboard
articles.summary: NewJeans and Funko are collaborating on officially-licensed merchandise, signaling the introduction of a new product line.

articles.title: UGG just dropped a sweet new color in the Ultra Mini & Classic Mini that ...
articles.author: Lehigh Valley
articles.summary: UGG is frequently releasing new products and colors.
